TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrincipalCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.Generic.ICollection`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public Class PrincipalCollection Implements ICollection, ICollection(Of Principal), IEnumerable(Of Principal)

summary.span: 从 类派生的对象的可变集合。

span.span: A mutable collection of objects derived from the class.

summary.span: 该类设计用于包含 Principal 的多值属性。

span.span: This class is designed to be used for multi-valued properties that contain Principals.

summary.span: 操作此集合的内容会更改相应存储属性的内容，对相应的主体对象调用 时，该更改将成为永久更改。

span.span: Manipulating the contents of this collection changes the contents of the corresponding store property, which is made permanent when is called on the corresponding principal object.

summary.span: 将指定的主体添加到集合的末尾。

span.span: Adds the specified principal to the end of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与和，有四个重载对此函数，但它们都执行相同的操作。As with and , There are four overloads to this function, but they all do the same thing. 额外的重载仅实现了以提高可用性，以便开发人员使用 Intellisense，请参阅采用重载， ，或对象。The extra overloads are only implemented to improve usability, so that developers using Intellisense see overloads that take a , , or object. 调用用户、 组或计算机重载的任何一个是完全等效于调用重载。Calling any one of the User, Group, or Computer overloads is exactly equivalent to calling the overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `array` 必须是一维数组。`array` must be one-dimensional. 如果不是，引发。If it is not, an is thrown. 如果要复制的元素数大于从的可用空间，则引发进一步异常`index`到末尾`array`，如果`array`是`null`，或者如果`index`小于 0。Further exceptions are thrown if the number of elements to copy is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of `array`, if `array` is `null`, or if `index` is less than 0.
